rows.label: tev013201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Maxim about the tragedy on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask if Maxim has any interesting news.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Maxim for his thoughts on Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Maxim for his impression of Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Maxim for his thoughts on Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Maxim about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0001
rows.name:
Earth got caught in the middle of a war between xenos
and was reduced to dust in the solar winds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0002
rows.name:
Only a lucky few were able to secure spots on a
handful of interstellar spacecrafts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0003
rows.name:
And the few whose ships actually made it off Earth
safely were the luckiest of the lucky.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0004
rows.name:
When I looked out the window of my ship, I saw the
other crafts being shot down one after the other.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0005
rows.name:
I was heartbroken. And also frightened, I don't mind
telling you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0006
rows.name:
I like to believe that ships besides the Whale survived,
but I know that's wishful thinking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0009
rows.name:
A Mediator named Suriella recently sat next to me
at the diner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0010
rows.name:
She began grilling me with question after question
about how many people lived on Earth, what
sort of civilizations were there, and the like.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0011
rows.name:
Perhaps the shock of our crash landing gave her
amnesia?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0012
rows.name:
If so, more's the pity. Bad enough to lose your home,
but to also lose all your memories of it? 
I can't imagine anything more tragic.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0021
rows.name:
She is a warrior Valkyrie descended from the heavens
to bring salvation to Mira![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0022
rows.name:
Her strength is divine, but it's her beauty that leaves me
with no better comparison than a goddess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0023
rows.name:
If I possessed the strength to fight the Ganglion,
I'd sign up for her team in an eyeblink.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0024
rows.name:
But alas, I am but an artist with the soul of a poet.
If only one could fight the Ganglion with pretty words![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0026
rows.name:
If you truly have the will, I can train you to fight.
But I warn you, my regimen is strict, and I do not
tolerate failure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0027
rows.name:
E-Elma! My lady! Nothing would please me more than
to fight at your side![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0028
rows.name:
But alas, my wit is the only weapon I have mastered.
I fear that my place is here, composing paeans of love
to your beauty and skill.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0029
rows.name:
I value actions, not words. ...And I could never return
the love of so hollow a man.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0046
rows.name:
Despite her youth, she's a first-rate mechanic,
as well as a compassionate person who never
ignores a soul in need.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0047
rows.name: I think we all have great expectations for her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0048
rows.name:
If Elma is our warrior Valkyrie, then Lin is... Um...
Her adorable sidekick?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0050
rows.name:
Hey, I know we all pale in comparison to Elma,
but you're making me a SIDEKICK?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0051
rows.name:
Ah! Forgive me, my lady. Allow me to respectfully
name you...New LA's fairy princess![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0052
rows.name: Aw, you're gonna make me blush![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0069
rows.name: Hair that sparkles like crystal... Skin of milky white...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0070
rows.name:
Elma's true form is that of a shimmering angel!
Or perhaps a mermaid. ...Er, with legs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0071
rows.name:
O muse! Thou has forsaken me! I fear there is no way
of expressing her beauty in mere words.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0072
rows.name:
Still, in this vast universe, there must be many
xenoforms like her. And yet, on this planet,
she is alone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0073
rows.name:
It must be so sad for Elma to be separated so.
I hope more of her kind come here to New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0074
rows.name: So who is that Lyvia person, anyway?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0075
rows.name:
She seems some manner of ghastly demon when
compared to Elma's heavenly angel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013201_MSG0076
rows.name:
She is an absolutely frightful creature.
And you keep some dismally poor company![ST:wait ]
